# hw_cracker (Resource)

A crunchy companion resource perfect for soups and spreads. Demonstrates how simple resources with quantity-based pricing can be managed efficiently in Terraform configurations.

*Golden and crisp,*
*Snapping with each bite,*
*The perfect crunch.*



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `kind` (String) The kind of crackers (e.g., saltine, oyster, graham)
- `quantity` (Number) The number of cracker packs

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the cracker resource

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Cracker identifier
- `price` (Number) The price of the crackers in dollars (hardcoded to $0.50 per pack)
